results.title: [Refractory hypertention in a female patient with renal failure].
results.text_hl: Three months after the manoeuvre the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was again referred to our unit with @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Postoperative_Nausea_and_Vomiting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020250 @@@nausea vomiting@@@ and @DISEASE_Tension_Type_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D018781 @@@hyper-tension@@@ refractory to @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 10 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@doxazosine@@@ 4 mg twice a a day, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@ 50 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Zuccalà A, Losinno F, Fiorenza S, Lifrieri F, Rapanà R. [Refractory hypertention in a female patient with renal failure]. G Ital Nefrol. 2005 Nov-Dec;22(6):617-20. PMID: 16342054
